alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 12 at 6:43PM MDT until October 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 228, 229, 230, 232, 233, AND 237... Gusty winds are expected to continue into the overnight hours for much of the warned area, however, relative humidity values have begun to rise into the low 20s. For this reason, the Red Flag Warning will be allowed to expire on time.
